item.title: On Planning and Reports
item.description: In my previous employment, I didn’t have any problems with submitting reports, practically because we used a time management/monitoring tool and the reports sort of generated by themselves.

item.title: Migs in the Office!
item.description: Miguel got real bored at home and wanted to go and meet his classmates. Since school doesn’t start until the 7th, I decided to take him with me to the office.
